definitions: Abe: A common Japanese surname. Notable individuals include Shinzō Abe, a former Prime Minister of Japan.
Hiwatari: A Japanese surname. It can also refer to a fictional character, Kai Hiwatari, from the anime series Beyblade.
Hayashi: A common Japanese surname. It can also refer to a type of Japanese forest or grove.
examples: Shinzō Abe served as Prime Minister.
Kai Hiwatari is a Beyblade character.
The Hayashi family owns the restaurant.
